resources.string: Placeholder for the desciption of the module

Spanish Grammar and Vocabulary 

Copyright 
Modern Language Centre
King ’s College London 2016

Project Board:
Initial stage: Dominique Borel and Catherine Brossard
Final Stage: Dr. Ana María Sousa Aguiar de Medeiros and Anette Schroeder Rossell

Project manager:
Cecilia Trevino

Instructional Design: Cecilia Trevino 

Content written by Cecilia Trevino with the help of Diego Iudicissa, Victoria Montesinos Gasser and Beatriz Sanitago.

Content development: Cecilia Trevino and Philip Wallace 
Theme Design: Philip Wallace

Language Consultancy: Alejandra Lopez Vazquez and Marta Nunez.

Technical Consultancy: Philip Wallace and Vanessa Skiadelli.

Video Scripts written by Cecilia Trevino

Video Production: Vanessa Skiadelli and Cecilia Trevino. 

Voices:
James Brillantes
Cecilia Trevino
Adrian Gordaliza-Vega
Beatriz Santiago 
Lucia S. Moraga
Alejandra Coutts-Lopez
Diego de Jesús Flores-Jaime

Audio recording and editing: James Brillantes and Cecilia Trevino

Pictures selection and editing Victoria Montesinos Gasser and Cecilia Trevino

Proofreading: Beatriz Santiago, Victoria Montesinos Gasser, Nick Shepherd, Tony Thorne and María Martínez Delgado Veiga.

Testing: María Martínez Delgado Veiga.

This project was funded by King’s College London Technology Enhanced Learning Fund.

Special thanks to: 
Daniel Barrington and Dr. Ian Barrett from the Faculty of Arts and Humanities
Nelly Mars and Teresa García form the Modern Language Centre.
Professor Mark Russell, Elena Hernandez-Martin, and Vanessa Skiadelli, from the Centre of Technology Enhanced Learning. 
Dr. Erika Erdely Ruiz from the Centre for Mexican Studies National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM)-King’s College London.

a la derecha: to the right, a la izquierda: to the left, abierto: open, abrigo: coat, acuarela: watercolour, adiós: goodbye, aeropuerto: airport, agencia de viajes: travel agency, agua con gas: sparkling water, agua sin gas: still water, ahí / allí: there, al lado (de): next (to), albergue: hostel, almuerzo: lunch, amarillo/a: yellow, andén: platform, antes: before, apellido: surname, aperitivo: appetizer, aquí: here, arte moderno: modern art, artista: artist, ascensor: elevator, autobús: bus, avión: plane, ayudar: to help, azúcar: sugar, azul: blue, baloncesto: basketball, bar: bar, barrio: district, beber: to drink, bebida: drink, bicicleta: bicycle, billete de ida y vuelta: return ticket, billete de ida: one-way ticket, billete: ticket, blanco/a: white, botones: bellboy, buenas noches: good evening / night, buenas tardes: good afternoon, buenos días: good morning, caliente: hot, calle: street, camarero/a: waiter / waitress, cambiar: to exchange, cambio: change, camisa: shirt, camiseta: t-shirt, cansado: tired, carne: meat, carta: menu, catedral: cathedral, cena: dinner, centro comercial: shopping centre, cerca: nearby, cerrado: closed, código postal: postcode, comer: to eat, comprar: to buy, consigna: left-luggage office, copa: glass (wine), cortado: espresso macchiato, cuadro: picture, cuchara: spoon, cucharilla: teaspoon, cuchillo: knife, chaqueta: jacket, chico/a: guy / girl, de nada: you’re welcome, del tiempo: room temperature, delante (de): in front of, dependiente/a: shop assistant, deportes: sports, deportista: athlete, derecha: right, desayuno: breakfast, después: after, detrás: behind, devolución: refund, devolver: to return, días festivos: bank holidays, días laborables: weekdays, difícil: difficult, dirección: address, discoteca: disco / club, discoteca: disco / club, domingo: Sunday, efectivo: cash, en frente (de): opposite (to), encantado / mucho gusto: nice to meet you, ensalada: salad, entrada: ticket, entre: between, equipaje: luggage, escaleras mecanicas: escalator, escaleras: stairs, escultura: sculpture, esquina: corner, estación: train station, estoy muerto/a: I’m dead tired, estudiar: to study, excursión: excursión / trip, exposición: exhibition, fácil: easy, farmacia: pharmacy / chemist, fin de semana: weekend, frío/a: cold, fruta: fruit, fútbol: football, galería de arte: art gallery, galleta: biscuit, ganga: bargain, genial: cool, girar: to turn, glorieta: roundabout, gracias: thank you, guía turístico: tourist guide, guía: guidebook, habitación: room, hacer planes: making plans, hasta luego: see you later, hasta pronto: see you soon, hielo: ice, hola: hello / hi, horario: opening hours, horario: schedule, hostal: guesthouse / inn, hotel: hotel, iglesia: church, infusión: herbal tea, izquierda: left, jersey: jumper, jueves: Thursday, juntos: together, la cuenta: the bill, leche: milk, leer: to read, lejos: far, limonada: lemonade, lugares turísticos: places of touristic interest, lunes: Monday, llamada perdida: missed call, llamar: to call, maleta: suitcase, mañana: morning, mapa: map, mármol: marble, marrón: brown, martes: Tuesday, mensaje (de texto): text message, menú: set menu, mesa: table, metro: tube, miércoles: Wednesday, monumento: monument, morado/a: purple, museo: museum, nacionalidad: nationality, naranja: orange, natillas: custard, negro/a: black, niño/a: boy / girl, noche: night, nombre: name, obra maestra: masterpiece, ocupación: occupation, oleo: oil painting, pan: bread, pantalón: trouser, parque: park, pastel: cake, patatas fritas: French fries, pedir: to order, perdone: excuse me, persona mayor: senior citizen, pescado: fish, pintor: painter, pintura: painting, planta: floor, plato: dish, plaza: square, pollo: chicken, ponerse de acuerdo: to agree, postre: dessert, precio: price, preguntar: to ask, presentar: to introduce, primer plato: starter, probador: fitting room, probarse: to try on, propina: tip, quedar: to meet, quedarse: to stay, quiosco: kiosk, rebajas: sales, recepción: reception, recepcionista: receptionist, recibo: sales receipt, recoger: to pick up, refresco: soft drink / soda, registrarse: to check in, reserva: reservation / booking, reservar: to book, restaurante: restaurant, retrato: portrait, rojo/a: red, rosa: pink, sábado: Saturday, sala: room, sandalias: flip flops, seguir: to continue, segundo plato: main course, servicio de habitaciones: room service, servicios: public toilet, servilleta: napkin, silla: chair, sopa: soup, supermercado: supermarket, talla: size, también: too, tampoco: neither, tarde: afternoon / evening, tarifa: fare, tarjeta de crédito / débito: credit / debit card, taxi: taxi, taza: cup, té: tea, teléfono: telephone, tenedor: fork, tenis: tennis, tetera: teapot, tienda: shop, todo recto: straight away, tomar algo: to go for a drink, trabajar: to work, transporte público: public transport, tren: train, vagón: carriage, vale: okay, vaqueros: jeans, vaso: glass (tumbler), ver: to watch, verde: green, verdura: vegetables, vestido: dress, vía: track, viajar: to travel, viaje: trip, viajero: passenger, viernes: Friday, vino blanco: white wine, vino rosado: rose wine, vino tinto: red wine, visita con guía: guided tour, visitar: to visit, zapatería: shoe shop, zapatos: shoes, zumo de naranja: orange juice
